page.title: 07JOINERY & SERVICE ENGINEER
page.content: Mr.Dennis{Backhouse}is the{Hunsingore joiner.He showed us round all his buildings.He showed us most of his machines.He has:a mortiser,a band_saw, a planer and a plane_saw.One of his buildings has a little hatch to pull wood through.He gets his wood from Canada,Switzerland, and Russia.He never goes very far away to work.Mr. Backhouses father started the business about 60 years ago.Mr.Backhouses son works for him when he is not at school.He is 15 years old.The oldest building is the one nearest the road.Mr.Backhouse has cut his thumb off on the band_saw.He makes gate posts and gates with all kinds of timber.He also has a different job,he organizes funerals when any one dies. {Graphicas}is owned by Jacob{Potts.}He repairs and services office machinery like duplicators,photo copiers,etc.
